concept.title: Branch filtering: Single condition set for a branch
concept.shortdesc: Using a single ditavalref element as a child of a map or map branch indicates that the map or map branch must be conditionally processed using the rules specified in the referenced DITAVAL document.

conbody.p: The following rules outline how the filtering conditions that are specified in DITAVAL document are applied:

dlentry.dt: ditavalref element as a direct child of a map
dlentry.dd: The filtering conditions are applied to the entire map.

dlentry.dt: ditavalref element within a map branch
dlentry.dd: The filtering conditions are used to process the entire branch, including the parent element that contains the ditavalref element.

dlentry.dt: ditavalref element within a topicref reference to a local map
dlentry.dd: The filtering conditions are applied to the submap.

dlentry.dt: ditavalref element within a topicref reference to peer map
dlentry.dd: The reference conditions are not applied to the peer map.
